Mix shortening, sugar and eggs together thoroughly. Sift together flour, cream of tartar, soda and salt. Stir the two mixtures together. roll into ball the size of walnuts. dip in mixture of equal parts cinnamon and sugar. place two inches apart on lightly greased baking sheet. bake until lightly browned but still soft (8 - 10 minutes) at 400 degrees farenheit. makes 3 dozen.
